name: Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc.
description: Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the development, ownership, and management of high-quality commercial and residential properties. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia, the company operates primarily along the East Coast of the United States. Armada Hoffler’s portfolio includes a diverse range of assets, such as multifamily residential buildings, retail spaces, and commercial office properties. The company emphasizes strategic development projects, value creation, and long-term growth, leveraging its extensive market knowledge and strong relationships with local communities. In addition to property development, Armada Hoffler is committed to sustainability and aims to integrate environmentally responsible practices into its operations. The company’s investment strategy focuses on high-demand markets with favorable demographic trends and economic growth potential. With a dedicated management team and a solid track record, Armada Hoffler Properties continues to seek opportunities to enhance shareholder value through prudent investments and property management.

seo.meta_description: Explore Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc., a leading real estate investment trust specializing in residential and commercial properties along the East Coast.
